name: QUBIC
description: QUBIC is a retro-like turn-based puzzle game in which your task is to solve the labyrinth, collect the stars to unlock next level, avoid enemies/traps and... SAVE YOUR QUBIC GREEN ASS!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 5.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Of course! If you want to hear something! c: Additional Notes: Keyboard AND mouse

reviews.review_text: I <3 this game. Surprisingly QUBIC is very fun like SnakEscape! It has interesting sharp screen effect, a lot of different levels and fast turn-based gameplay.  I recommend this Game to any person who loves puzzle & turn-based games.
